title: Judge Fines Trump Lawyers in Clinton Conspiracy Suit Tossed in September
description: The sanctions ruling comes as a range of lawyers working for former President Donald J. Trump are under scrutiny.
dc:creator: Charlie Savage
media:credit: Maddie McGarvey for The New York Times
media:description: A judge wrote that Mr. Trump’s lawyers had put forward “political grievances masquerading as legal claims.”
